descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a series of gray boxes along the top and right side.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...color a box red if it is intersecting both gray boxes both horizontal and vertical.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...grey squares on a black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...use the grey squares as reference to make red squares. The grey squares on the top are X, the grey squares on the right side are Y. Imagine a line that will intersect from X and Y squares. At that spot paint a black square red.
